mapper.select: select c.doc_code_name as code, d.doc_detail_name as name, d.retention_period as period from doc_detail_code d join doc_code c on d.doc_code=c.doc_code
select d.dept_name as dept, e.emp_name as name, r.role_name as role from employee e left outer join department d on e.dept_code=d.dept_code left outer join role r on e.role_code=r.role_code
